titles.title: Strong Are The Walls Around me (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Strong are the walls around me That hold me all the day But they who thus have bound me Cannot keep God away My very dungeon walls are dear Because the God I love is here{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}They know who thus oppress me 'Tis hard to be alone But know not One can bless me Who comes through bars and stone He makes my dungeon's darkness bright And fills my bosom with delight{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy love O God restores me From sighs and tears to praise And deep my soul adores Thee Nor thinks of time or place I ask no more in good or ill But union with Thy holy will{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis that which makes my treasure 'Tis that which brings my gain Converting woe to pleasure And reaping joy from pain Oh 'tis enough whate'er befall To know that God is All in all{/lang-eng}
